synopsis
a competent hse officer with 6.10 year exp of accomplished career track
in onshore and
implementation of the hse policy and program. preparation of risk assessment, job hazard analysis, application procedure and emergency rescue plan
hazard observation & corrective action research & studies for the improvement of safety in the yard, workshop and site conduct orientation and training program for employees. providing continue to employees. prepares & submits incident/accident reports, investigates & study the root cause
and then recommends corrective measures to decrease their frequency &
prevents
reoccurrence.
documentation and record keeping of all . participation and suggestions in weekly zero accident team meeting conduct daily tool box meeting to the workforce. supervising the procurement & distribution of ppe. participation in weekly joint safety audit and daily safety manager site walk down. periodically inspection of tools & other safety related equipment. conducting fire fighting training.. job responsibility for fire:-
triangle of fire, types of fire, causes of fire, media of extinguishing of fire, features of
extinguishing fire.
to arrange training programs for company employees. fire fighting, fire prevention, fire
detection system etc.
handling of any type of fire, evacuation plan, rescue plan, salvage etc.
periodical check of fire detection, fire prevention and fire fighting equipment.
